phrs.translation: 摆渡人, 渡者, 摆渡者, 渡船夫
摆渡人, 渡船夫, 船夫
费里曼酒店, 船夫酒店

sentences.sentence: Otherwise I couldn't heard facial muscles of the Styx ferryman twisting…
sentences.translation: 不然怎么会分明听到冥河摆渡人的面部肌肉已经暗中欣喜了很久…

sentences.sentence: He became a ferryman and stayed at the river's side for many years learning its quiet lessons.
sentences.translation: 他成为一个渡船夫，在河边度过许多年，领悟河流安静的启示。

sentences.sentence: Can't wait to start our journey as coach, the role of ferryman in this world in my mind: talk soon.
sentences.translation: 迫不及待要开始我们的教练之旅，那个在我看来就像是在这个世上就像是个摆渡人一样的角色，下次聊叻。
